description.es-ES: Da vida a tus ideas diseñando tu propio tema a través de este módulo que incluye todos los elementos configurables necesarios.
description.en-US: Give life to your ideas designing your own theme through this module that includes all the necessary configurable elements.

documentation.es-ES: Give life to your ideas designing your own theme through this module that includes all the necessary configurable elements.
documentation.en-US: Design your own theme and give life to your ideas!

descriptionShort.es-ES: Módulo que incluye todos los elementos configurables para crear una tema.
descriptionShort.en-US: A module that includes all configurable elements to create a theme.
